roleset.name: to conduct (oneself) in an unacceptable manner
roleset.note: MISBEHAVE-V NOTES: Framed by Claire (from misbehave.01-v)

role.descr: manner, unlikely argument as "badly" is understood

example.name: Without Manner
example.text: He-1 who *T*-1 feels secure from punishment misbehaves.
example.arg: He-1 who *T*-1 feels secure from punishment
